page.title: 09CHURCH FARM (PART1)
page.content:
Caroline's Dad works Church Farm. He told us about the Austrian prisoners working on his farm during world war 2. They made one of the sheds which can still be seen in his farm yard . He also told us about his auntie who fell in love with an Italian prisoner called Ernesto Cerafer and they married soon after.Mr.Racey also said he uses old bomb shelters as grain stores.When we asked him if anything funny happened to him he told us he found some bombs while he was ploughing a field and he called the police to keep everyone away from the airfield.A few minutes later a man came from the army to defuse them,but put them in the boot of his car and told Mr.Racey they were harmless.
By Daniel & Matthew
